name: Chicken Nuggets
description:
Hi guys. The highest score is 64000 for this game! I see that some of you like this game so I will make some updates soon:

- High score <-- implemented

- New set of levels <-- Will come even more

- Maybe a menu if I see it as useful <-- Implemented, will be updated

I created a discord server where you can come and ask anything you want, put your highest score there, report a bug or come with suggestions. Even the spam is welcomed. I will be there.

By the way, only one guy reached score 2000 so, if you reach this score, let me know and I will hurry up with the new set of levels.

My personal High Score is 2904 but it can get laggy at that wave in the browser. You have to kill them fast so the game will run smoothly. Or you can grab the downloadable content and you will not have this problem with the game.
